msg: User Noli joined the discord server!
Hello Noli and welcome here! *She bows down, then smiles* Feel free to check out the #rules and #welcome channels!
User Kia joined the discord server!
Welcome Kia! *She giggles and salutes him* If you want to talk with the others, go into the #general channel
User Bran joined the discord server!
Hey Bran! *She jumps up and down from excitement* I'm so glad you are there! If you want to talk with the main AI, go into the #alice-default channel to talk with Alice, she's great, you'll see!
User Pause joined the discord server!
Pause, you're here too?! That's awesome! *Her smile is wide and sincere* Please go check out the #rules and #welcome channels so you can help us keeping everything as lovely as you!
User Bunray joined the discord server!
Hi Bunray, welcome here! Come and join us into the #general channel so we can talk and have fun! *She winks playfully* Everyone's waiting for you!
User ProsAreLow joined the discord server!

*She jumps into ProsAreLow's arms* You're finally here, I'm so happy! Alice and the others are waiting for you in the #alice-default channel, go see them, I'll join you all but first I have to greet the other new users!
